sentences:
Luis Roche was an important Venezuelan urbanist and was the Venezuelan ambassador to Argentina .
He was also an amateur film director .
In the 1930s , Roche advocated for the redesign of Caracas , to include developed corridors to a multi - purpose center .
His suggestion involved a 36-meter - wide avenue based on Avenue des Champs - Élysées .
He was responsible in great measure for the development of Caracas ' east side during the 1940s .
He contributed to the development of neighborhoods such as La Castellana , Altamira and La Florida .
Roche was a relevant diplomatic figure as well , being appointed as Venezuela 's ambassador to Argentina .
He married a Colombian / French lady by the name of Beatrice Dugand , with whom he had four children , Beatrice Roche , Lilianne Roche , Marcel Roche and Luis Armando Roche .
An important avenue in Altamira ( Caracas ) bears the name Luis Roche in his honor .
